info.name: pinterest in black by ironwhy (2013 March 21)

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://pinterest.com/"), url-prefix("https://pinterest.com/login/"), url-prefix("https://pinterest.com/"), url-prefix("http://blog.pinterest.com/") {


a, 
h1,
h2,
h3,
p,
span,
.username
{
 text-decoration: none!important;
 text-shadow: none!important;
 color: #070!important;
}

a:hover, 
span:hover,
{
 color: #040!important;
}

html,
.AboutLinks,
.actions,
.addPinContent,
.appContent,
.attributionItem,
.attributionName,
.BoardInfoBar,
.boardLinkWrapper,
.boardPinsGrid,
.boardWrapper,
.categoriesWrapper,
.Closeup,
.commentDescriptionContent,
.commenterWrapper,
.commentsContainer,
.divider,
.Domain,
.FeedPage,
.findPins,
.formFooter,
.header,
.headerBackground,
.headerContainer,
.InfoBarBase,
.mainContainer,
.modalContainer,
.modalMask,
.PaddedPin,
.padItems,
.pinDescription,
.pinMeta,
.pinUserCommentBox,
.relatedPinsWrapper,
.secretBoardHeader,
.secretBoardWrapper,
.sectionTitle,
.standardForm,
.ui-ImageUploader,
.UserInfoBar,
.userProfileHeaderRepinsFrom,
.UserRecentActivity
{
 background: #000!important;
 border-color: #000!important;
 box-shadow: none!important;
}

}
